subject: Re: [PATCH] nfsd: report the requested maximum number of threads instead of number running

reviews.author: Chuck Lever
reviews.summary: The reviewer, Chuck Lever, pointed out that the documentation should be updated to reflect the change in behavior of the interfaces reporting the configured maximum threads instead of running threads.

reviews.author: Jeff Layton (author)
reviews.summary: The reviewer suggested that the patch is less surprising than the current behavior and proposed adding netlink attributes to report the number of running threads, but acknowledged that this can be obtained from 'ps' instead.

reviews.author: Mike Owen
reviews.summary: Reviewer Mike Owen questioned how users would retrieve the currently set minimum, maximum, and actual running thread count reliably after dynamic threading patches, suggesting a man page update.
